title: Shield TV gets 9.0.1 update to fix Android 11 issues including Plex servers, storage permissions
content:
The Nvidia Shield TV series has easily become the collection of Android devices with the best update history, but the recent upgrade to Android TV 11 brought with it some major bugs. Now, Nvidia is rolling out the 9.0.1 update for Shield TV that fixes the most common issues.

more…

The post Shield TV gets 9.0.1 update to fix Android 11 issues including Plex servers, storage permissions appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Nvidia has just started rolling out update 9.0.1 to its Shield TV lineup to fix issues the came with the recent Android 11 rollout.
